name: CLYDE-WAX Waterproof Dressing
description: CLYDE-WAX is for use on cotton fabrics. Obtain the water repellency and durability found in traditional “Oil Skins” or “Tin Cloth” on any garment or bag. Apply our waterproof dressing to the garment of your choice, and watch the water roll off. Great on messenger bags, panniers, backpacks, jackets, shoes, work aprons or anything else you can think of. For Directions on how to use wax, go here Beeswax used in Clyde-Wax is sourced from Wisconsin bees. The wax is usually shipped the next day, but in some cases it may take longer. Expect delivery in 7-10 days. We ship anywhere in the world. Contact us for bulk orders or multiple tin orders. We will work to make shipping affordable for overseas customers.

name: RWTCO. Vinyl Sticker 3.5" Sticker
description: Riverwest Trading Company's own vinyl sticker. The 3.5" sticker is screen printed on quality outdoor with our newest logo configuration based on the classic design of our CLYDE-WAX label. Get 'em while they are hot! Printed in the USA.
